Since we use PathPlanner, which monitors acceleration and velocity throughout the path, this causes our robot to drive past the end of the path, and then suddenly make a jerky correction after about 0.7 seconds.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWe don’t have multiple loop overruns anywhere during teleop, have any other teams had this problem?
